content.rendered:
SUMMER BEACH GETAWAY FASHION FAVORITES

Summer has finally arrived and it inspired me to pick some of my current fashion favorites. Starting off with a bold gold swimsuit look (the ’80s are back!) from FWRD.COM and adding some retro ’70 inspired sunglasses. I always check out Forward because their style and the way they put looks together on a model is on another level. If you ever need outfit inspo head over to FWRD.COM Hat is by Janessa Leone. These cool retro’80s inspired sunglasses are by Acne Studios.

You can’t start Summer without beautiful lashes. Book your D’Lashes lash extensions appointment few days before your vacation or getaway. With lash extensions you wake up ready to go…no makeup needed! Book appointment here. If you don’t have time for lash extensions grab the famous D’Lashes strip lashes from our shop here. 

Famous for their vintage inspired denim RE/DONE.com just announced their new swimwear line…. and it’s going to be your new favorite new brand! Their new swimsuits are inspired by classic ’90s looks and fun ’80s style. This black swimsuit is super flattering on any body shape and doubles as a cool bodysuit with your favorite denim bottoms. Don’t forget to add these Givenchy sandals to finish off your look.

Always protect your skin from the sun especially at the beach. I love this new Sports BB sunscreen from Shiseido from Nordstrom.com And how cute is this beach Prada bag? Yes! 

Happy Summer!

LOVE DIONNE
